attributes.action: Ensure Net Neutrality remains in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
If there is no Net Neutrality, ISPs like BT and Virgin will be able to block apps, slow websites, and charge fees to control what you see and do online- for example, you may have to pay extra to access streaming services such as Netflix.

To learn more about Net Neutrality, why it's important, and/or want tools to help you fight for Net Neutrality, visit BattleForTheNet: https://www.battleforthenet.com/
You can support groups like the Electronic Frontier Foundation and the ACLU and Free Press who are fighting to keep Net Neutrality:
https://www.eff.org/
https://www.aclu.org/
https://www.freepress.net/
https://www.fightforthefuture.org/
https://www.publicknowledge.org/
https://www.demandprogress.org/
attributes.background: Considering current discussions in the United States regarding the abolishment of 'Net Neutrality' rules, we want reassurance and certainty that Net Neutrality in the UK remains in place both now and in the future.
